name: Evil Dawns
description:
Game Title: Evil Dawns

Game Designer: Jakk Dion

Studio: ZL Studios

Engine: RPG Maker MV

Genre: Action-Adventure

Subgenre: Survival/Psychological Horror

Version ID: Alpha

Version Number: 2.2.1

Story Completion: 25%

Game Completion: 75%

Estimated Gameplay Time: 2 Hours

Evil Dawns follows the story of Sarah Brown, who is a 13 year old girl whose father and uncle go missing. The game takes place all in a Mansion in the year of 1827 that she presumes to be haunted at first. As the story progresses, she realizes not all is what it seems. She searches the Mansion, discovering clues as to what happened to her family and all the other people who have gone missing.

Through the game, you search rooms for clues as to what might have happened. The storyline can be found scattered throughout the mansion. You can solve puzzles to get items, or keys, to progress further. The game has no combat. Evil Dawns has 6 different possible endings. (You may have to play through the game a few times to get the best possible ending.) The 6th ending is only available after beating the game with one of the "good" endings.

Default Keys:

  • I - Items
  • F - Light
  • J - Journal
  • M - Map

Features:

  • (NEW Feature; not in VX Ace version) Journal System
  • Horror Atmosphere/Elements
  • Puzzle Elements
  • Six Different Endings
  • Ranking System
  • Four Difficulties for Action and Puzzles
